name: Sugar Crash
description:
Don't let your blood sugar levels drop too low while off-roading in Sugar Crash! Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 40.

Controls:

Get as many sodas as you can before you get a sugar crash! Use the keys in the left and right boxes to turn, the down box key to reverse, and the up box key to give you a little extra speed. When you get a soda, your sugar crash timer resets, and you get faster, but all of your keys change so be ready! Watch out for buildings or your sugar-filled adventure might end early!
